cmp: 车 (car/a vehicle/machine/to shape with a lathe, vehicle on land)
mng: to wave, to brandish, to command, to conduct, to scatter, to disperse

exm.mng: to wave, to brandish, to command, to conduct, to scatter, to disperse
to display, to exhibit, to bring out implicit or innate qualities, to express (a thought or moral), to develop (an idea), to elaborate (on a theme)
to sprinkle, to shed (tears, blood etc), fig. free, unconstrained, to write in a free style
to squander money, extravagant, prodigal, free and easy, agile
to conduct, to command, to direct, conductor (of an orchestra)
to write or draw with a brush, to put pen to paper, to write
to shed tears, to be all in tears
